group_1.textLeft: (Now what am I supposed to do?)

group_1.textRight: Myako-senpai!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300350:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]E...E...Emiri?!

group_1.textRight: Are you hurt?! Gettin' smaller anywhere?!

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeSmall]What?! No! ...Wait!
It's not what it looks like! Not at all!
Th-there's a reason for this, okay?!

group_1.textRight: Hinano's being weirder than normal.@Is she going to be okay?

group_1.textLeft: The Witch's curse isn't making her loopy,@is it...?

group_1.textRight: [chara:300601:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]Her face is, like, waaay flustered...
Hey, I bet that dude out cold over there@is the guy!
The mature girl admirer who's missin' out@on Myako-senpai's love!

group_1.textLeft: Come on, that'd be way too coincidental@to be him...
[bgEffect:shakeSmall]Aaaaaah! Aaaaaaaaah!!!

group_1.textRight: But that seems to be the case.
Okay, that reaction's pretty telling, but@is that how you're supposed to react?!
Does that mean it's the miracle of miracles?
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Must be! Best. Chance. EVERRR!
Myako-senpai! This is, like, the perfect @chance! 'Fess up!

group_1.textLeft: No! I can't! No way!
Remember, he's into some mature hot girl@already?
And look at me? I couldn't be further from@that.
And I'm not one to steal some other girl's@guy...

group_1.textRight: Uh, like, admiring someone just means you@kinda look at 'em and think, like, niiice.
That doesn't mean they're datin' and stuff,@you know?
And look at you now, Myako-senpai!
You're pretty dang seriously mature and@epic.
So, like, you're actually this guy's type@now!

group_1.textLeft: ...No way.
No way that can happen!
I'm telling you, it's no use! I can't!@I've given up, it's fine, thank you!

group_1.textRight: Well, I haven't!
Just so you know...
I totally don't want you to regret stuff!
So...please go? For real? Okay?

group_1.textLeft: ...I won't. I don't even have the chocolate@anymore.

group_1.textRight: Myako-senpai!

group_1.textLeft: Hm?
Calm down, geeze. Why do YOU care?

group_1.textRight: Hinano... Emiri is right. He likes a mature@girl, yes?
Among us, who has been a Magical Girl@longer than anyone?

group_1.textLeft: What're you talking about?
I'm not the oldest! There's Yachiyo Nanami,@and uhh...umm...

group_1.textRight: See? I totes trust you, Myako-senpai.
Like, literally, I KNOW it'll be all right!
But Valentine's Day only happens once@a year or whatever, okay?
If you botch it this time, do it the next@year!
And if you botch that year, do it the one@after the next, too...
But I mean... [chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300601:cheek_1][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1][chara:300601:tear_1]I mean! Uuugh!

group_1.textLeft: You're right.
Wow, you were the last person I'd expect to@teach me how to live as a Magical Girl.
I admit it, I was wrong.
Yup.
"There's waaay too much love in this batch@for us to just gulp down and stuff."
I'm quoting Emiri.

group_1.textRight: Yes, that was spot on.

group_1.textLeft: Ah! That guy's waking up! [chara:300801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300801:cheek_0][chara:300801:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300801:lipSynch_1]Come on, quick!

group_1.textRight: Oww, my head... Oh, Hinano?
What happened to me?

group_1.textLeft: W...well... I-I-I'm just glad you're safe.

group_1.textRight: Nnngh... I can't remember...
But it feels like...
...I just had a VERY close call, and you@rescued me...

group_1.textLeft: Uh, well, you're not wrong.
But yeah...
While I'm saving you...@I need to tell you something...
